title: GET_CLOSEST_VEHICLE_NODE
content:
0x240A18690AE965130x6F5F1E6C// GetClosestVehicleNode
BOOL GET_CLOSEST_VEHICLE_NODE(float x, float y, float z, Vector3* outPosition, int nodeFlags, float zMeasureMult, float zTolerance);Parameters:x: X coordinatey: Y coordinatez: Z coordinateoutPosition: Pointer to the found nodes coordsnodeFlags: Node flagszMeasureMult: How strongly the difference in the Z direction should be weightedzTolerance: How far apart the Z coords have to be before zMeasureMult kicks inReturns: Returns the closest vehicle node matching the node flags.enum eGetClosestNodeFlags {
    GCNF_INCLUDE_SWITCHED_OFF_NODES = 1,
    GCNF_INCLUDE_BOAT_NODES = 2,
    GCNF_IGNORE_SLIPLANES = 4,
    GCNF_IGNORE_SWITCHED_OFF_DEADENDS = 8,
    GCNF_GET_HEADING = 256,
    GCNF_FAVOUR_FACING = 512
}
codeBlocks:
// GetClosestVehicleNode
BOOL GET_CLOSEST_VEHICLE_NODE(float x, float y, float z, Vector3* outPosition, int nodeFlags, float zMeasureMult, float zTolerance);

enum eGetClosestNodeFlags {
    GCNF_INCLUDE_SWITCHED_OFF_NODES = 1,
    GCNF_INCLUDE_BOAT_NODES = 2,
    GCNF_IGNORE_SLIPLANES = 4,
    GCNF_IGNORE_SWITCHED_OFF_DEADENDS = 8,
    GCNF_GET_HEADING = 256,
    GCNF_FAVOUR_FACING = 512
}
